description: Discover the best hotels in Boston, United States. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Idyllic Boston Back Bay Escape with Daily US$75 Dining Credit & Onsite Rooftop Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of Bostonian elegance at The Newbury Boston, a landmark hotel located in the city's historic Back Bay. From this central location, stroll through the beautiful Public Gardens and along the cobblestoned road of Newbury Street, where you’ll pass quaint boutiques and cafes, continue to Boston Common, the USA’s oldest official public park (established in 1634), and catch a performance in the nearby theatre district. Return to find an elegant balance between the hotel’s roaring 1920s roots and modernised first-class facilities, which include the hotel's rooftop restaurant, Contessa, offering panoramic city views and Italian-inspired dishes, a Jay Wright-designed fitness centre and sultry cocktail lounge.

hotels.title: Five-Star Boston Heritage Stay with Award-Winning Spa & Ramsay’s Kitchen
hotels.description: Classic elegance and chic modern furnishings combine to create the luxurious five-star Mandarin Oriental, Boston, featuring the first Forbes-awarded, five-star spa in Boston, along with a culinary experience designed by Chef Gordon Ramsay himself. Ideally positioned in the heart of Back Bay, this opulent hotel is within moments of the city’s shopping and business districts, allowing you to immerse yourself in Boston’s vibrant and bustling culture. Luxuriate in ornate suites overlooking the dazzling city lights and pamper yourself in the exclusive spa before heading down to taste exquisite twists on local classics at Ramsay’s Kitchen.

hotels.title: Modern Waterfront Escape on Boston Harbour with Three Onsite Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Experience Boston's historic charm with a stay at InterContinental Boston, an IHG Hotel. Perfectly positioned on the city's waterfront, this modern glass tower offers breathtaking views of Boston Harbour. Venture out to explore the nearby Freedom Trail, a 2.5-mile long path through the city that passes 16 locations significant to the history of the United States. After a day of sightseeing, dine at Miel Brasserie for French cuisine with an American flair or grab an outdoor cocktail and light bites while taking in city views at 510 on the Waterfront.

hotels.title: Bold Boston Escape Next to Fenway Park with Three Restaurants
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of luxury at the stylish Hotel Commonwealth, nestled in the heart of Boston's vibrant Kenmore Square. This warm and welcoming stay is your gateway to Fenway Park, the world-renowned Boston University and the city's eclectic dining scene. Unwind in sumptuously appointed rooms, savour fresh seafood delights at the Pescador Coastal Grill and delicate Japanese bites at Blue Ribbon Sushi and unwind while pumping some iron in the hotel's fully-equipped gym.

hotels.title: Five-Star Boutique Stay in the Heart of Boston's Historic Beacon Hill Neighbourhood
hotels.description: Ensconced within the gaslit streets of Boston’s historic Beacon Hill district is the five-star boutique XV Beacon hotel, offering meticulous service and fashionable luxury in the heart of the city. Inhabiting a turn-of-the-century Beaux-Arts building and featuring a midnight-black, gilded exterior, the hotel is an architectural jewel, indicative of the immaculate attention to detail expressed everywhere within. Its inimitable character is set apart by a breathtaking, world-class gallery - featuring abstractionist masterpieces, haunting portraits and an ancient Roman mosaic - and the decidedly unique Mooo…. restaurant, a modern steakhouse boasting the finest A5 Wagyu and a dazzlingly extensive wine list.

hotels.title: Historic Boston City Break in Glamorous Cambridge with Stylish ArtBar
hotels.description: Discover bustling markets, storied sporting grounds, renowned restaurants and revolutionary history from the heart of one of Boston's most charming neighbourhoods, Cambridge, with a stay at Royal Sonesta Boston. Contemporary art meets modern style at this stylish hotel which is situated along the picturesque Charles River and showcases breathtaking city views. Royal Sonesta Boston has all the amenities to make your trip memorable. Wake up to daily breakfast and a steaming hot mug of coffee and house-made pastry at Studio Café & Bakery, and unwind after busy days with a dip in the glistening pool or adventure to the fitness centre for a quick workout. End your day in bustling Boston at the ArtBar which combines original art from contemporary artists with quirky cocktails and artfully presented food.

hotels.title: Heritage Boston Landmark Stay neat Fenway Park with Popular Restaurant & Rooftop Health Club
hotels.description: Experience Boston's rich history and vibrant culture with a stay at the Fairmont Copley Plaza, majestically located in the heart of the city's historic Back Bay. Just steps away, you'll find the renowned shops of Newbury Street, the charming Boston Public Library, and the bustling Copley Square Farmers Market. When you're not exploring the city, dine at OAK Long Bar + Kitchen, the hotel's farm-to-table American brasserie, or enjoy a drink in the stylish lounge. Fitness enthusiasts can keep up their routine at the hotel's state-of-the-art rooftop health club, overlooking the surrounding neighbourhood.

hotels.vendor_name: Staypineapple, A Delightful Hotel, South End Boston
hotels.title: Vibrant Heritage Stay in South End Boston
hotels.description: Discover bustling markets, storied sporting grounds, renowned restaurants and revolutionary history from the heart of Boston's charming 'Southie' or \"SoBo' neighbourhood with a stay at the Staypineapple, A Delightful Hotel, South End Boston. This boutique, art-inspired property is an easy walk from iconic landmarks including the Freedom Trail, Boston Common, Chinatown and Newbury Street. The whimsical Staypineapple Hotels are built as 'celebrations of the living arts'. The lobby and guest rooms are dotted with beautiful abstract pieces and decorative tiling, with Staypineapple's signature yellow accents and pineapple logo making a frequent appearance. The chic Trophy Room restaurant and bar is an understated tribute to the city's sporting prowess and the perfect place to enjoy Sunday brunch or evening cocktails. Combining South Bostonian charm and vibrance with modern chic, thoughtful features and gracious service, all wrapped in the stylish package of a historic building, the Staypineapple, A Delightful Hotel, South End Boston is your inner-city sanctuary.
